title: AFL State of Origin coaches hail success of concept following Victoria's win over Western Australia
desc: Winning Victoria coach Chris Scott and his Western Australia counterpart Dean Cox call for State of Origin to be played every year after the concept's stunning return in Perth.

title: US-Iran tensions updates: Oman to host peace talks in Geneva next week
desc: US Iran tension updates: Oman will host peace talks between Iran and the US next week, amid rising tensions and rallies against the Iranian government in Germany's Munich. | World News

title: Police make arrest in alleged kidnapping of $3m ‘money mule’ in kiwifruit tax scam
desc: Police have charged a Bay of Plenty man for allegedly kidnapping a ‘money mule’ who threatened to expose a multi-million dollar tax fraud scheme in the...

title: Italian migrants who brought 'fancy cheese' to Australia
desc: When John Interlandi's father began making "fancy cheese" in Gippsland, few Australians had heard of parmesan. At 90 years old, Mr Interlandi is still perfecting it.

title: Lakers’ Luka Doncic plans to play in NBA All-Star Game
desc: The superstar guard has missed the last four Lakers games because of a strained hamstring. Clippers star Kawhi Leonard is making his seventh appearance.

title: Berlin Film Festival Defends Jury & Actors Following Backlash
desc: The Berlinale has issued a lengthy statement "in defense of our filmmakers, and especially our Jury and Jury President", following a backlash.

title: 'I will be Olympic champion': Canadian skate star Dandjinou vows to atone for 2nd disappointing result
desc: Will Dandjinou shed no tears after missing the podium in the 1,500 metres. He wasn’t inconsolable, or anything like it. He was radiating anger, like a man intent on revenge.

title: PCG: 3 fishermen earlier reported missing found alive off Occidental Mindoro
desc: Three fishermen previously reported missing were found alive and rescued in the waters of Occidental Mindoro on Saturday, the Philippine Coast Guard said.

title: Body-worn cameras ready for all cops nationwide
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: All frontline police personnel and officers throughout Malaysia have now begun wearing body-worn cameras (BWC) as Bukit Aman step up a gear in the fight against misconduct, corruption and abuse of power.

title: Char kuay teow fires up love
desc: KULAI: Char kuay teow, as it turns out, is the way to a woman's heart.
